data.script:
<script>
    import {
        Button,
        Card,
        ContextButton,
        Popover,
    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";

    let state = false;
</script>

<Button on:click={() => (state = !state)}>
    Toggle Popover
</Button>

<Popover
    logic_id="popover-state"
    alignment_x="right"
    spacing="medium"
    bind:state
    hidden
>
    <ContextButton palette="accent">
        Open Popover
    </ContextButton>

    <Card.Container
        palette="auto"
        elevation="medium"
        max_width="content-max"
    >
        <Card.Section>Toggleable Popover</Card.Section>
    </Card.Container>
</Popover>
data.title: Popover State
